msg: Fixed typo reported by Vladislav Protasov

author: deweese
msg: 1) Slightly improved the offscreen buffer handling code.
The offscreen buffer is now always aligned with the tile grid.
This allows all rendering to occure in the offscreen (previously
the edges often needed to be done in a tile then copied...
2) Fixed a few sample model creation bugs in some Reds.
(The 't-shirt' bug should be fixed Stephane)
3) Fixed a surround bug in FiterResRable, correctly this time :)
I needed to divide by the scale not multiply.
This should remove all the tiling artifacts that sometimes appear
in the shadow of batikLogo when zoomed and panning.

author: deweese
msg: 1) New Renderer architecture that ties in with the tile cache.
2) Default tiles size now controled by static method in AbstractTileRed
(eventually could be exported to user if we wanted to).
3) AbstractTileRed is even better at pulling stuff out of cache first.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Provided optimized implementations of all SVG composite modes for INT_PACK
data (2-3x improvement, but aren't _really_ widely used).
2) Fixed a bug in BackgroundRable where it modified the bounds stored in
the AbstractGraphicsNode.
3) AbstractGraphicsNode now checks to ensure the clip and mask intersect
the bounds before intersecting (avoids erronious intersection calc).

author: cjolif
msg: fix a remaining problem with drag event. When there's nothing under
the mouse the event should not be forwarded.
